data.title: bmx-transmission
data.description: This is an Angular2+ utility library to handle api calls and data manipulation for each step of the api call such as pre-execute, post-execute, on-success, on failure etc.

data.title: bmx-onepiece
data.description: This is an starter template for expressjs + mongodb backend where user manaement, security management and logging is already implemented with proper documentation and scaffolding.

data.title: python-sorter
data.description: Python library to sort a list of numbers using various sorting algorithms. Also show summary of the execution time for those algorithms.
